channel.title: .jarring client
channel.description:
I'm trying to create a webclient and I've followed multiple tutorials, I get mostly everything except the jarring part.
I set the output file to my desktop, input to my client folder, set the manifest to client, even signed it but when I create the .jar file it doesn't open my client.
I click on it and it acts like it's going to open for a second then absolutely nothing happens.
**FIXED**
exion client has a shitty main method

item.title: .jarring client
item.dc:creator: @Drcode Drcode
item.description:
@Drcode wrote:

I personally jar with eclipse because its so much easier and faster…
Link to Tut on how to jar with eclipse - http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/508576-how-create-executable-jar-using-eclipse.html

But if you prefer to jar with jarmaker link is - http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/466541-noob-friendly-how-jar-sign-your-rsps-client-noob-friendly.html

Just follow steps by steps with no rush and i bet you will get it right. If that don’t work just explain to me the problem your having and i or someone else will help.

Blalla i hope this help? and i don’t think your allow to pay here… this is a forum for free help … All you need to do is explain and someone who knows this basic might help you. But try using Eclipse and see which one is more successful(which both should be successful at all time) but i hope this help… if not post what issue your having

Read full topic
